column4: hey i have a alienware x-51 and i just installed ubuntu 12.04.1 along side windows 7 but grub doesn't detect windows
also the display is funny, it says its at 1920x1080 resolution but it doesn't fill my screen
you run sudo update-grub in ubuntu
i think its a issue with uefi
easiest way to see the whole setup is using the bootscript. http://bootinfoscript.sourceforge.net/
hmm it shows windows boot info in the boot info script thing
ah ha, i think it figured it out

for anyone curious i found a web-page and it says this: It should automatically boot into Ubuntu. If you wish to make it boot into Windows first, simply go into the BIOS and change the Hard Drive BBS priority so Windows Boot Manager comes first.
Post the text from that script in a pastebin
The key to getting tis working is the efi setup, make sure you mention this, I'm not familiar with it.
yeah thats what i'm thinking, i'm new to efi as well, if it were normal bios i know how to fix it
